about_the_game:
This soundtrack for There's Always a Madman: V.I.C.T.O.R. includes two tracks: the game's title track "To the Victor" with lyrics, which can be heard on the game's title screen, and an instrumental version of that same song.

1. The title track "To the Victor" containing lyrics that plays on the title screen

2. An instrumental version of the title track "To the Victor"

Note that this only contains these two tracks from the game. It is not a complete soundtrack of all music in the game. This is the only music from the game for sale.

content_descriptors.notes: The title track for "There's Always a Madman: V.I.C.T.O.R." is about a group of criminals coming together to try and rid the world of their archnemesis - secret agent Franklin Benjamin.
